cause.description:
Marijuana SHOULD NOT be legalized, if you are a retarded loser that has nothing better to do than do drugs and smoke pot, you should have serious consequences. Millions of kids and parents do this and it is not right. There are a bunch of causes saying legalize mrijuanna, I say stick those causes up your candy asses losers. Drug free and always will be!
1. Marijuana should not be leagalized
cause.name: Keep Marijuana Illegal
